committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the manner in which the area known as the Goshen Historic Track in Goshen, New York, can be protected.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to determine the most appropriate means of preserving the Goshen Historic Track in Goshen, New York, by examining the feasibility of: (1) entering into cooperative agreements with the track owners; (2) purchasing the track for inclusion in the National Park System; and (3) any other means of preservation. Authorizes appropriations for fiscal year 1982.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the manner in which the area known as the Goshen Historic Track in Goshen, New York, can be protected.
